bugReport.Title: The link [Share price] redirects to the english page from Trading Course 1, section 2 when AR, NL, VI, TH or ZN is chosen
bugReport.Steps: <1>Navigate to capital.com</1> <2>Hover over the [Education] menu section</2> <3>Click the [Trading —Åourses] menu item</3> <4>Click the [Who are the main market players?] row in the Introduction to Financial Markets box</4> <5>Select AR, NL, VI, TH or ZN language</5> <6>Scroll to the second to the last paragraph</6> <7>Click the link [Share price]</7>
bugReport.ExpectedResult: The link [Share price] redirects to the page translated into chosen language
bugReport.ActualResult: The link [Share price] redirects to the english page
